name: Trainer Utilization
query:
SELECT
    t.trainer_name AS "Trainer Name::200",
    t.gender AS "Gender::200",
    t.employee AS "Employee ID:Link/Employee:300",
    t.specialization_name AS "Specialization::300",
    
    COUNT(tm.members) AS "Total Members:Int:200"
FROM
    `tabTrainer` t
LEFT JOIN
    `tabAssigned Members` tm ON tm.parent = t.name
GROUP BY
    t.name, t.trainer_name, t.gender
ORDER BY
    COUNT(tm.members) DESC;
